TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IButtonControl

summary.span: 允许控件用作窗体上的按钮。

span.span: Allows a control to act like a button on a form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如, 默认情况下, 可以使用此接口来处理此接口。An example of where this interface might be implemented is default and cancel button processing. 当为窗体输入未处理的 ENTER 键时, 将会通知默认按钮, 就像对话框关闭一样。Default buttons are notified when an unprocessed ENTER key is entered for a form, just like a dialog box would be closed. 同样, 只要在窗体上输入了未处理的 ESC 键, 就会收到 "取消" 按钮的通知, 这与对话框的效果非常类似。Similarly, cancel buttons are notified whenever an unprocessed ESC key is entered on a form, much like a dialog box would be dismissed. ## Examples 下面的示例从类继承并实现接口。The following example inherits from the class and implements the interface. 将实现添加到属性和和方法。Implementation is added to the property and the and methods. [!code-cpp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CPP/mybutton.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CS/mybutton.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/VB/mybutton.vb#1)]

para.span: 在充当按钮控件的类中实现此接口。

span.span: Implement this interface in classes that act as button controls.

para.span: 此接口的成员将提供基本按钮功能, 如向父窗体提供或执行事件的功能, 或者充当窗体的默认按钮。

span.span: The members of this interface will provide basic button functionality, such as providing a to the parent form or the ability to perform a event, or acting as the default button of a form.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult DialogResult { System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult value); };
member this.DialogResult : System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置单击按钮时返回给父窗体的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value returned to the parent form when the button is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当窗体使用方法显示为对话框并且单击其中一个按钮时, 该按钮的值将分配给窗体的属性。When a form is shown as a dialog box using the method and one of its buttons is clicked, the button's value is assigned to the form's property. ## Examples 下面的示例从类继承并实现接口。The following example inherits from the class and implements the interface. 将实现添加到属性和和方法。Implementation is added to the property and the and methods. [!code-cpp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CPP/mybutton.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CS/mybutton.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/VB/mybutton.vb#1)]

param.span: 如果控件要用作默认按钮，值为 ；反之，值为 。

span.span: if the control should behave as a default button; otherwise .

summary.span: 通知某个控件是默认按钮，以便相应调整其外观和行为。

span.span: Notifies a control that it is the default button so that its appearance and behavior is adjusted accordingly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由父窗体调用, 使控件成为默认按钮。This method is called by a parent form to make a control the default button. 默认按钮设置为具有额外的粗边框。Default buttons are set to have an extra thick border. ## Examples 下面的示例从类继承并实现接口。The following example inherits from the class and implements the interface. 将实现添加到属性和和方法。Implementation is added to the property and the and methods. [!code-cpp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CPP/mybutton.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CS/mybutton.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/VB/mybutton.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PerformClick() cil managed

summary.span: 为该控件生成 事件。

span.span: Generates a event for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户按 ENTER 键时, 为具有焦点的按钮或默认按钮 (如果没有其他按钮, 则为默认按钮) 调用此方法。This method is called for the button that has focus, or for the default button (if no other button has focus) when the user presses the ENTER key. 如果按钮设置为 "取消" 按钮, 则当用户按 ESC 键时也会调用此方法。This method is also called when the user presses the ESC key if the button is set as the cancel button. ## Examples 下面的示例从类继承并实现接口。The following example inherits from the class and implements the interface. 将实现添加到属性和和方法。Implementation is added to the property and the and methods. [!code-cpp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CPP/mybutton.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CS/mybutton.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/VB/mybutton.vb#1)]
